1370: Jurre was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Euffemia at age 25 in 1370.
Had a daughter with Euffemia, Auesoete, at age 25.
1372: Had a daughter with Euffemia, Hildeburgis, at age 27.
1375: Had a daughter with Euffemia, Berta, at age 30.
1377: Had a son with Euffemia, Oliuerus, at age 32.
1378: Had a son with Euffemia, Woutermanne, at age 33.
1379: Had a daughter with Euffemia, Berta, at age 34.
1382: Lost son Woutermanne when Woutermanne was 5 years old.
